strategies.title: Technical Analysis

bullets: Technical analysis is a trading discipline that uses price charts, patterns, and indicators to predict future price movements.
It focuses on historical price data, trading volumes, and other market metrics to identify trends and potential entry and exit points.
Technical analysis is widely used across different markets, including stocks, forex, and commodities.
